com.guimonsters.client

Class ClientStyles

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guimonsters.client.ClientStyles

  • public class ClientStyles
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines all of the text styles used by the client. Currently a stub class until we decide on how to manage text colors.
    Version:
    0.04, 2013-04-05
    Author:
    Elijah Atkinson
